dc_title_s: Hindoostan; or India : drawn from the most recent authorities for the illustration of Lavoisne's genealogical, historical, chronological and geographical atlas
dc_description_s: Includes information on India (situation, boundaries, extent, division, mountains, rivers, natural history and produce, population, islands, history, british possessions) and remarkable battles and sieges subsequent to the invasion of Genghis Khan.|36 x 35 Centimeters, on sheet 44 x 54 Centimeters|Scale 1:4,403,520. Scale of statute miles 69 7/2 to a degree.|General Map Collection
